00031 const char* mexpostfix = ".c"; 
00032 char* default_input_name = "arg_";
00033 char* default_output_name = "out_";
00034 char* parpostfix = "_par";

00045 void generate_mex() {
00046 
00047   char* mexname;
00048   char* tmp;
00049   char* class;
00050   int c,i,j,k;
00051 
00052   //printf("Allocating %d byte for '%s.c'.\n", sizeof(char)* (strlen(fname) + strlen(mexpostfix)+1), fname); 
00053   mexname = (char *) malloc( sizeof(char)* (strlen(fname) + strlen(mexpostfix)+1));
00054   strcpy(mexname,fname);
00055   strcat(mexname,mexpostfix);
00056   printf("generate %s\n",mexname);
00057 
00058   mex = fopen(mexname,"w");
00059   
00060   fputs(copyright_tmp, mex);
00061 
00062 /*in  = fopen("copyright.tmp","r");
00063   while( (c=getc(in)) != EOF)
00064     putc(c,mex) ;
00065   fclose(in);*/
00066 
00067   fprintf(mex,"#include <stdio.h>\n");
00068   fprintf(mex,"#include <mex.h>\n");
00069 
00070   if(!adic_on) { 
00071     if(!all_double)
00072       fprintf(mex,"#include \"amgmex.h\"\n");
00073     else
00074       fprintf(mex,"#include \"amgmex-double.h\"\n");
00075   }
00076   else {  
00077     if(!all_double)
00078       fprintf(mex,"#include \"amgmex-ad.h\"\n");
00079     else
00080       fprintf(mex,"#include \"amgmex-ad-double.h\"\n");
00081   }
00082 
00083   if (header_buffer[0] != 0) 
00084     fputs(header_buffer, mex);
00085 
00086   fputs(doc_tmp, mex);
00087   
00088 /* These files are now compiled into mexgen.
00089    in  = fopen("doc.tmp","r");
00090   while( (c=getc(in)) != EOF)
00091     putc(c,mex) ;
00092   fclose(in);*/
00093 
00094   if(adic_on) { 
00095     fputs(doc_ad_tmp, mex);
00096 /*    in  = fopen("doc-ad.tmp","r");
00097     while( (c=getc(in)) != EOF)
00098       putc(c,mex) ;
00099     fclose(in);*/
00100   }
00101 
00102   for(i=0;i<n_inputs;i++)  
00103     fprintf(mex,"#define  %s%s   arg[%d]\n",
00104             input_arr[i]->name,
00105             parpostfix,
00106             input_arr[i]->rank-1); 
00107   fprintf(mex,"\n"); 
00108 
00109   if(adic_on)
00110     fprintf(mex,"int amg_num_independents;\n");
00111 
00112   fputs(input_tmp, mex);
00113 /*  in  = fopen("input.tmp","r");
00114   while( (c=getc(in)) != EOF)
00115     putc(c,mex) ;*/
00116   if(adic_on) { 
00117     i=0;
00118     while( (i<n_inputs) && !input_arr[i]->isactive ) i++;
00119     if( i == n_inputs) { 
00120       printf("ERROR: no input active variables?\nsome input variables should be set with -active\n");
00121       exit(1); 
00122     }
00123     fprintf(mex,"\tamg_num_independents = numel(%s) / numel(%s);\n\n", 
00124             input_arr[i-1]->name,
00125             input_arr[i]->name);
00126     
00127   }
00128   for(i=0;i<n_inputs;i++)
00129     fprintf(mex,"\t%s*  %10s =  arg[%d]->data;\n",
00130             input_arr[i]->explicit_type,
00131             input_arr[i]->name,
00132             input_arr[i]->rank-1); 
00133     
00134   if(display_input)
00135     fprintf(mex,"\tdisplay(arg,nrhs);\n");
00136 
00137   // TO DO:
00138   //     use mxErrMsgTxt..
00139   fprintf(mex,"\tint* amg_itmp;\n");
00140   for(i=0;i<n_inputs;i++) { 
00141     
00142     if(input_arr[i]->size != (char *) 0) { 
00143       fprintf(mex,"\tif(!has_equal_dims(%s%s,%s%s)) {\n",
00144               input_arr[i]->name,parpostfix,
00145               input_arr[i]->size,parpostfix); 
00146       fprintf(mex,"\t\tprintf(\"Error: %s and %s should have equal dimensions\");\n\t\texit(1);\n\t}\n",
00147               input_arr[i]->name,input_arr[i]->size);
00148     }
00149     else if(input_arr[i]->ndims != 0) { 
00150       fprintf(mex,"\tamg_itmp = (int *) malloc(sizeof(int) * %d);\n",
00151               input_arr[i]->ndims);
00152       for(j=0;j<input_arr[i]->ndims;j++)
00153         fprintf(mex,"\tamg_itmp[%d] = %s;\n",j,
00154                 input_arr[i]->dims[j]);
00155       fprintf(mex,"\tif(!has_equal_size(%s%s,amg_itmp,%d))\n",
00156               input_arr[i]->name,parpostfix,
00157               input_arr[i]->ndims);     
00158       fprintf(mex,"\t\tprintf(\"??? Error: argument %d is not of admissible size\\n\");\n",i+1);
00159     }      
00160   }
00161       
00162   fprintf(mex,"\n");
00163 
00164   for(i=0;i<n_inputs;i++) 
00165     if(input_arr[i]->type != (char *) 0) { 
00166       fprintf(mex,"\tif(!has_equal_type(%s%s,%s%s)) {\n",
00167               input_arr[i]->name,parpostfix,
00168               input_arr[i]->type,parpostfix); 
00169       fprintf(mex,"\t\tprintf(\"Error: %s and %s should have equal dimenstions\");\n\t\texit(1);\n\t}\n",
00170               input_arr[i]->name,input_arr[i]->type);
00171     }
00172   fprintf(mex,"\n");
00173 
00174   fputs(output_tmp, mex);
00175 /*  out = fopen("output.tmp","r");
00176   while( (c=getc(out)) != EOF)
00177     putc(c,mex) ; */
00178 
00179   create_outputs();
00180 
00181   if(adic_on) { 
00182     
00183     //fprintf(mex,"\n\tad_AD_Init(%d);\n\n",num_independent_variables);
00184     fprintf(mex,"\n\tad_AD_Init(amg_num_independents);\n\n");
00185 
00186 
00187     for(i=0;i<n_inputs;i++) 
00188       if(input_arr[i]->isactive) 
00189         fprintf(mex,"\tDERIV_TYPE* grad(%s) = deriv(%s,%s);\n",
00190                 input_arr[i]->name,
00191                 input_arr[i]->name,
00192                 input_arr[i-1]->name);
00193 
00194     fprintf(mex,"\n");
00195     for(i=0;i<n_outputs;i++) 
00196       if(output_arr[i]->isactive) { 
00197         if(output_arr[i]->size != (char *) 0)
00198           fprintf(mex,"\tDERIV_TYPE* grad(%s) =\n\t\t (DERIV_TYPE *) mxMalloc( sizeof(DERIV_TYPE) * numel(%s));\n",
00199                   output_arr[i]->name,
00200                   output_arr[i]->size);
00201         else { 
00202           fprintf(mex,"\tDERIV_TYPE* grad(%s) =\n\t\t (DERIV_TYPE *) mxMalloc( sizeof(DERIV_TYPE)",
00203                   output_arr[i]->name);
00204           for(j=0;j<output_arr[i]->ndims;j++)
00205             fprintf(mex," * %s",output_arr[i]->dims[j]);
00206           fprintf(mex,");\n");
00207         }
00208       }
00209             
00210     //fprintf(mex,"\n");
00211     fprintf(mex,kernel_buffer);
00212 
00213     fprintf(mex,"\n");
00214     for(i=0;i<n_outputs;i++) 
00215       if(output_arr[i]->isderiv) { 
00216         if(output_arr[i+1]->size != (char *) 0) { 
00217           fprintf(mex,"\tget_value(grad(%s),numel(%s),%s);\n",
00218                   output_arr[i+1]->name,
00219                   output_arr[i+1]->size,
00220                   output_arr[i+1]->name);
00221           fprintf(mex,"\tget_grad(grad(%s),numel(%s),amg_num_independents,%s);\n",
00222                   output_arr[i+1]->name,
00223                   output_arr[i+1]->size,
00224                   output_arr[i]->name);
00225         }
00226         else { 
00227 
00228           tmp = (char *) malloc( 1000 );
00229           tmp = strcpy(tmp,output_arr[i+1]->dims[0]);
00230           for(j=1;j<output_arr[i+1]->ndims;j++) { 
00231             tmp = strcat(tmp," * ");
00232             tmp = strcat(tmp,output_arr[i+1]->dims[j]);
00233           }
00234 
00235           fprintf(mex,"\tget_value(grad(%s),%s,%s);\n",
00236                   output_arr[i+1]->name,
00237                   tmp,
00238                   output_arr[i+1]->name);
00239           fprintf(mex,"\tget_grad(grad(%s),%s,amg_num_independents,%s);\n",
00240                   output_arr[i+1]->name,
00241                   tmp,
00242                   output_arr[i]->name);
00243           
00244         }
00245       }      
00246   
00247     fprintf(mex,"\n\tad_AD_Final();\n\n");
00248   }
00249   else
00250     fprintf(mex,kernel_buffer);
00251 
00252   fprintf(mex,"\n}\n");  
00253 
00254   fclose(mex);
00255 }
00256 
00257 char* mx_class(argument *ptr) { 
00258   char *tmp;
00259 
00260   tmp = (char *) malloc(sizeof(char) * 20);
00261  
00262   if(!strcmp(ptr->explicit_type,"double") )
00263     strcpy(tmp,"mxDOUBLE_CLASS");
00264   else  if(!strcmp(ptr->explicit_type,"float") )
00265     strcpy(tmp,"mxSINGLE_CLASS");
00266   else  if(!strcmp(ptr->explicit_type,"long") )
00267     strcpy(tmp,"mxINT64_CLASS");
00268   else  if(!strcmp(ptr->explicit_type,"int") )
00269     strcpy(tmp,"mxINT32_CLASS");
00270   else { 
00271     printf("Error: %s is unsupported type\n",ptr->explicit_type);
00272     exit(0);
00273   }
00274   
00275   return tmp;
00276 }
00277 
00278 void create_outputs() { 
00279   int i,j;
00280   char* class;
00281 
00282   if(!all_double) 
00283     for(i=0;i<n_outputs;i++) {
00284 
00285       fprintf(mex,"\t%s* %s;\n",
00286               output_arr[i]->explicit_type,
00287               output_arr[i]->name);
00288 
00289       class = mx_class(output_arr[i]);
00290 
00291       if(output_arr[i]->size == (char *)0) {
00292         if(output_arr[i]->ndims == 2)
00293           fprintf(mex,"\t%s = create_matrix_fast(&plhs[%d],%s,%s,%s,mxREAL);\n",
00294                   output_arr[i]->name,
00295                   output_arr[i]->rank-1,
00296                   output_arr[i]->dims[0],
00297                   output_arr[i]->dims[1],
00298                   class);
00299         else { 
00300           fprintf(mex,"\tint *tmp = (int *) * mxMalloc( sizeof(int) * %d) ;\n", 
00301                   output_arr[i]->ndims);
00302           for(j=0;j<output_arr[i]->ndims;j++)
00303             fprintf(mex,"\ttmp[%d] = %s ;\n",j,output_arr[i]->dims[j]);
00304           fprintf(mex,"\t%s = create_array_fast(&plhs[%d],%d,tmp,%s,mxREAL);\n",
00305                   output_arr[i]->name,
00306                   output_arr[i]->rank-1,
00307                   output_arr[i]->ndims,
00308                   class);
00309         }
00310       }
00311       else if(output_arr[i]->type == (char *) 0) 
00312         fprintf(mex,"\t%s = create_identical_array_size_fast(%s%s,&plhs[%d],%s);\n",
00313                 output_arr[i]->name,
00314                 output_arr[i]->size,parpostfix,
00315                 output_arr[i]->rank-1,
00316                 class);
00317       else if(strcmp(output_arr[i]->size,output_arr[i]->type))
00318         fprintf(mex,"\t%s = create_identical_array_size_fast(%s%s,&plhs[%d],%s);\n",
00319                 output_arr[i]->name,
00320                 output_arr[i]->size,parpostfix,
00321                 output_arr[i]->rank-1,
00322                 class);
00323       else
00324         fprintf(mex,"\t%s = create_identical_array_fast(%s%s,&plhs[%d]);\n",
00325                 output_arr[i]->name,
00326                 output_arr[i]->size,parpostfix,
00327                 output_arr[i]->rank-1);
00328     }
00329   else
00330    for(i=0;i<n_outputs;i++) {
00331 
00332      if(strcmp(output_arr[i]->explicit_type,"double")) { 
00333        printf("Error: all types are supposed to be double\n");
00334        exit(1);
00335      }
00336 
00337      fprintf(mex,"\tdouble* %s;\n",output_arr[i]->name);
00338 
00339      if(output_arr[i]->size == (char *)0) {
00340        if(output_arr[i]->ndims == 2)
00341          fprintf(mex,"\t%s = create_matrix_fast(&plhs[%d],%s,%s);\n",
00342                  output_arr[i]->name,
00343                  output_arr[i]->rank-1,
00344                  output_arr[i]->dims[0],
00345                  output_arr[i]->dims[1]);
00346        else { 
00347          fprintf(mex,"\tint *tmp = (int *) * mxMalloc( sizeof(int) * %d) ;\n", 
00348                  output_arr[i]->ndims);
00349          for(j=0;j<output_arr[i]->ndims;j++)
00350            fprintf(mex,"\ttmp[%d] = %s ;\n",j,output_arr[i]->dims[j]);
00351          fprintf(mex,"\t%s = create_array_fast(&plhs[%d],%d,tmp);\n",
00352                  output_arr[i]->name,
00353                  output_arr[i]->rank-1,
00354                  output_arr[i]->ndims);
00355        }
00356      }
00357      else
00358        fprintf(mex,"\t%s = create_identical_array_fast(%s%s,&plhs[%d]);\n",
00359                output_arr[i]->name,
00360                output_arr[i]->size,parpostfix,
00361                output_arr[i]->rank-1);
00362    } 
00363 }
